entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the new official Liquid Metal docs site!
entry.content:
Welcome to the new official Liquid Metal docs site!

We are very excited to open up this project to the community, and the docs are a major step towards making using and contributing to LM components accessible.

We will use this blog to make announcements, publish community news, as well as highlight major release changes for our users.

If you would like to get involved in the project in any way, please don't be shy! We are excited to get feedback and questions from users, and any input from contributors.

Watch this space for more exciting developments!
